title: How to refine my spoken word poetry - Quora

response.answer_text: Lists. A good list is the most poetic thing in the world. A list of concrete things works better than a list of abstractions (like “love,” “hate,” etc.). Any word that has an image that goes with it (like “barn” or “bird”) is a concrete word. Also, make sure to use strong verbs (like “He zipped up his coat.”)
